pkgmetadata.longdescription: SQL Interface to 'Snowflake', 'Redshift', 'Postgres', 'SQLite', and 'DuckDB' // Run 'SQL' queries across 'Snowflake', 'Amazon Redshift', 'PostgreSQL', 'SQLite', and 'DuckDB' from R with a single function. Optionally stream and cache large query results to a local 'DuckDB' database for efficient work with larger-than-memory datasets.
